EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Denver Office Grand Opening - June 11
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We invite you to join us <http://pivotal.io/office-opening/denver> for the opening of our new Denver office on Thursday, June 11.
To show our appreciation for your support, we'd like to invite you to join industry leaders from across Denver for an evening of networking, conversation and fun.
We look forward to you joining us for drinks, hors d'oeuvres and entertainment while networking with innovative leaders from Pivotal and across multiple industries.
Space is limited! REGISTER NOW <http://pivotal.io/office-opening/denver>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us <mailto:info@pivotal.io>. PIVOTAL OFFICE OPENING 1644 Platte St Suite 200 Denver, CO 80202 Thursday, June 11, 2015 5pm - 8pm REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/office-opening/denver>
